recipe.title: Guacamole for Lindsay
ingredients: 3 firm but ripe Hass avocados, halved, pitted, peeled, and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1/2 jalapeño pepper, seeded and finely chopped
instructions: In a large bowl, gently fold the avocados, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeños, garlic, and cumin together. Season to taste with salt.
In a large bowl, gently fold the avocados, cilantro, lime juice, jalapeños, garlic, and cumin together. Season to taste with salt.
